Element.Description: BEAst: There are two ProfileIDs defined for the Advanced Despatch Advice. One profile is used when the receiver of the Despatch Advice is expected to return a response message, the other is used when no response message is used. Possible choices are: "urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:despatch_advice_only:1" and "urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:despatch_advice_w_response:1" Peppol:
BEAst: T0125/T6338, Despatch Advice Number Peppol:
BEAst: T6325, Document Date/Time. Peppol:
BEAst: T6325, Document Date/Time. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Transport Information (T6008). Peppol:

BEAst: T3309/T6335, Order Number/Call Off Reference. Attribute schemeID can be used to send Project Number (T6004) or Customers' Reference (T6005). Default is Order Number so if schemeID is missing the number in the element is Order Number as per Peppol global BIS. "ProjectReferece" is used for Project Number only. "AccountingCost" is used for the Customer's Reference. Here you always use the accounting information. The group OrderReference can be repeated. Peppol:

Attribute.Description: BEAst: "ProjectReference" and "AccountingCost" can be used as values for the schemeID attribute

Element.Name: Additional document reference
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used for additional BEAst information on header level.

Element.Name: Identity of the reference.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The reference number of the added information. Can be the Seller's Order Number (T6099), Final Customer's Order Number (T6221), Drawing Number (T6222), Delivery Part (T6340), Freight Payer's Customer Number (T6463) or Document Name (T6484) depending on DocumentType.

Element.Name: Document Type Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The type of reference. "BEAST:FreightPayersCustomerNumber" (T6463), "BEAST:SellersOrderNumber" (T6099), "BEAST:FinalCustomersOrderNumber" (T6221), "BEAST:DeliveryPart" (T6340), "BEAST:DrawingNumber" (T6222) or Any other document type (T6473).

Element.Name: Attachment.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded Binary object.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object (T6475). filename refers to T6476.

Element.Name: External Reference.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource (T6187).

BEAst: This party defines the company that provides the goods or the service. It also defines the sender of the Despatch Advice. The real Ship-from Address must be provided in the Despatch Address when the Despatch Advice describes a movement. Peppol:
BEAst: Shipper (T0129) Peppol:
BEAst: Street Name (T5003) Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: City Name (T5005) Peppol:
BEAst: Postal Code (T6117) Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol:
BEAst: Country Code (T5007) Peppol:
BEAst: Party Name (T5001) Peppol:
BEAst: Name (T5012) Peppol:
BEAst: Phone Number (T5010) Peppol:
BEAst: Email Address (T5011) Peppol:

BEAst: This party defines the company that receives the goods or the service. It also defines the receiver of the Despatch Advice. The real Ship-to Address must be provided in the Delivery Location if the Despatch Advice describes a movement. If the Despatch address describes a service provided at a specific location, the Delivery Location contains this location. Peppol:
BEAst: Consignee (T0036) Peppol:
BEAst: Street Name (T5003) Peppol:

BEAst: Postal Code (T6117) Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol:

BEAst: Ultimate Customer ID (T6001 or T6223). Peppol:
BEAst: Ultimate Customer name (T5001). Peppol:
BEAst: Street Name (T5003). Peppol:
BEAst: Not used in BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: City name (T5005). Peppol:
BEAst: Postal code (T6117). Peppol:
BEAst: Not used in BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used in BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Country code (T5007). Peppol:
BEAst: T6127, Freight forwarder's reference number Peppol:
BEAst: Used by BEAst for Supplier Remark (T6038). Peppol:
BEAst: Total Gross Weight (T6472) Peppol:
BEAst: Total Gross Volume (T6494) Peppol:
BEAst: Not used in BEAst version 3.1 Peppol:
BEAst: Use a dummy value since this element is mandatory. Peppol:

Element.Name: Carrier Service Instructions.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Code to specify additional service from the transport company (T6466) where unique codes per transport company will be used, or for Unloading instructions, code (T6343). The Unloading Instruction Codes are as follows: Z50=Semitrailer removable roof, Z51=Truck, Z52=Truck with tail lift, Z53=Truck with crane max 4 m, Z54=Truck with crane 4-9 m, Z55=Truck with crane more than 9 m, Z56=Forklift, Z57=Semitrailer, Z58=Short term storage, Z59=Porterage, Z60=Carry-in service, Z61=Standard transport, Z62=Loaded on truck, Z63=Indoor storage, Z64=Outdoor storage, Z65=Package maximum weigh, ZZ=Mutually agreed.
BEAst: Used for Vehicle identity number (T6100) Peppol:

Element.Name: Party Identification.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. This party defines the company providing the transport service

Element.Name: The Identity of the Carrier Party.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Identifies the Carrier party (T3208).
BEAst: Party Name (T5001) Peppol:
BEAst: Not used in BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:

Element.Name: Original Despatch Transportation Service.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify Fuel consumption and Environmental Emission.

Element.Name: Tranport Service Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Use "FuelReport" since this element is mandatory.

Element.Name: Transport Equipment.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify fuel consumption. To be repeated for all fuel types used.

Element.Name: Tranport Equipment Type Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Product Group Name (T0012).

Element.Name: Description.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Fuel description (T6226).

Element.Name: Fuel measurements.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify information about the fuel and fuel consumption.

Element.Name: Attribute ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To define the type of measurement. EnergyContent = T6428, ConversionFactor = T6429, FuelConsumption = T6374, DrivingDistance = T6380, DrivingTime = T6381, FuelMeasurementMethod = T6728, EngineType = T6379, RenewableFuel = T6382.

Element.Name: Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The measured value. Used for EnergyContent, ConversionFactor, FuelConsumption, DrivingDistance, DrivingTime and RenewableFuel. unitCode refers to T6706.

Element.Name: Attribute value.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Description of the attribute when there is no value to measure. Used for FuelMeasurementMethod and EngineType. Possible values are for FuelMeasurementMethod: "AutomaticMeasurement", "StandardEstimate", "ManualMeasurement" and for EngineType: "Euro2", "Euro3", "Euro4", "Euro5", "Euro6", "EuroStep2", "EuroStep3A", "EuroStep3B", "EuroStep4".

Element.Name: Provider party.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To define the fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Party Identification.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To identify the fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Identity of the fuel supplier.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The fuel supplier (T6001).

Element.Name: Party Name.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The name of the fuel supplier (T6427).

Element.Name: Name of the fuel supplier.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The fuel supplier.

Element.Name: Goods Item.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify the type of fuel.

Element.Name: Item.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify the type of fuel.

Element.Name: Seller's Item Identification.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify the type of fuel.

Element.Name: Supplier's identity of the fuel.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The fuel article number (T0172).

Element.Name: Standard Item Identification.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Only one Standard Item Number can be used. Specify the type of standard in schemeID.

Element.Name: Standard article identity of the fuel.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The fuel article number (T0172). The schemeID refers to the Article Number Type (T6317).

Element.Name: Environmental Emission.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To report the emissions.

Element.Name: Environmental Emission Type Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Defines the type of emission reported. Values: "CO2" (Carbon Dioxide), NOX (Nitrogen oxide), PM (Particulate Matter), HC (Hydro Carbon).

Element.Name: Value of Measurement.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The value of the emission. Refers to Carbon Dioxide (T6375)/Nitrogen Oxide (T6376)/Particulate Matter (T6377)/Hydro Carbon (T6378).

Element.Name: Shipment Stage.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used for Transport mode.

Element.Name: Transport Mode Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Transport Mode Code, T6131. Use UNECE Recommendation 19. (1 = Maritime transport (This code should be used whenever the transport vehicle completes any part of its journey by sea.), 2 = Rail transport, 3 = Road transport, 4 = Air transport, 5 = Mail, 6 = Multimodal transport, 7 = Fixed transport installations, 8 = Inland water transport, 9 = Mode unknown.)
BEAst: Tracking URL (T6737) Peppol:

Element.Name: Delivery Location.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Delivery Location is used to define the Ship-to when the Delivery Customer Party is not . When the Despatch Advice describes a movement, the Delivery Location should always be included. When the Despatch Advice describes a service given at a location, the Delivery Location describes this location.

Element.Name: Identity of the Delivery Location.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Identifies the Delivery Location (T0036).

Element.Name: Name of the Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The name of the Consignee (T5001).

Element.Name: Postal Address of Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Postal Address.

Element.Name: Street Name for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Street name (T5003).

Element.Name: Additional Street Name for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used for Department (T5002).

Element.Name: City Name for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Name of city (T5005).

Element.Name: Postal Zone for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Zip-code (T6117).

Element.Name: Country SubEntity for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Country Sub-entity.

Element.Name: Address Line for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst.

Element.Name: Address Line for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004).

Element.Name: Country for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Country.

Element.Name: Country Code for Consignee.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Country code (T5007).

Element.Name: Location Coordinate
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate System Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude Degrees Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The X coordinate (T6324). Use degrees with decimals.

Element.Name: Longitude Degrees Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Y coordinate (T6325). Use degrees with decimals.

Element.Name: Altitude Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Z coordinate (T6424).
BEAst: Unloading Date and Time (T6372)/Delivery Period Start Date (T6319) Peppol:
BEAst: Unloading Date and Time (T6372)/Delivery Period Start Time (T6734) Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Period End Date (T6320) Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Period End Time (T6735) Peppol:
BEAst: Loading Date and Time (T6371)/Despatch Date and Time (T6242) Peppol:
BEAst: Loading Date and Time (T6371)/Despatch Date and Time (T6242) Peppol:
BEAst: The Despatch Address is used to define the Ship-from when the Despatch Supplier Party is not. When the Despatch Advice describes a movement, the Despatch Address should be included. Peppol:
BEAst: Identity of the Despatch Address (T0129).
BEAst: Street Name (T5003). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: City Name (T5005). Peppol:
BEAst: Postal Code (T6117). Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information like Building (T5004). Peppol:
BEAst: Country Code (T5007). Peppol:

Element.Name: Location Coordinate
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To specify the coordinates.

Element.Name: Coordinate System Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Always "EPSG:3857" by definition.

Element.Name: Latitude Degrees Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The X coordinate (T6323). Use degrees with decimals.

Element.Name: Longitude Degrees Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Y coordinate (T6324). Use degrees with decimals.

Element.Name: Altitude Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Z coordinate (T6424).

Element.Name: Delivery Terms.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst.

Element.Name: Delivery Terms.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Delivery Terms code (T6710).

Element.Name: Delivery Terms Location.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst.

Element.Name: Delivery Terms Location.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Delivery Terms Location (T6020). The location to which the delivery terms refer. Used to qualify the delivery terms e.g. "Terms of delivery are FOB Rotterdam"

Element.Name: Transport Handling Unit.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify how the goods is packed.

Element.Name: ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The SSCC identification code of this Transport Handling Unit (T0138).

Element.Name: Transport Handling Unit Type Code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Type of Transport Handling Unit (T6119). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21 with addition of the codes used by "Retursystem Byggpall".

Element.Name: Measurement Dimension.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to specify any measurement of the Transport Handling Unit.

Element.Name: Measurement Attribute ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To describe the type of measurement (T6714). Use UNCL 6313 subset.

Element.Name: Measure.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. For the measure (T6122) and Measure of Unit Code (T6706). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 20 and 21. subset.
BEAst: Line Number (T0051) Peppol:
BEAst: Transportation Information (T6008) Peppol:
Element.Value: Mrs Green agreed to waive charge

Element.Description: BEAst: Delivered Quantity (T0070)/Despatched Quantity (T0131). unitCode refers to T6706 Peppol:
BEAst: Backordered Quantity (T0059). unitCode refers to T6706 Peppol:
BEAst: Change Reason Description (T6220) Peppol:
BEAst: Calloff Line Reference (T6336)/Reference to Order Line (T3322) Peppol:

Element.Name: Sales Order Line number.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Reference to the sellers orderline number (T6462).
BEAst: Order Number (T3309) Peppol:

Element.Name: Document Reference.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used for sending additional references at line level.

Element.Name: Document ID.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. ID of the referenced document or item: Reference to Delivery Note (T0063), Customer's Reference Number (T6005), Offer Number (T6010), Vendor's Order Number (T6099), Ultimate Customer's Order Number (T6221), Drawing Number (T6222), Material Ticket Number (T6329), Material Ticket Reference (T6337), Delivery Unit (T6340), Reference to Web (T6373), Ultimate Customer's Order Line Number (T6458), Offer Line Number (T6466) or Document Name (T6484).

Element.Name: DocumentTypeCode
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Identifies the type of document or item. ("BEAST:ReferenceToDeliveryNote", "BEAST:CustomersReferenceNumber", "BEAST:OfferNumber", "BEAST:VendorsOrderNumber", "BEAST:EndCustomersOrderNumber", "BEAST:DrawingNumber", "BEAST:MaterialTicketNumber", "BEAST:MaterialTicketReference", "BEAST:DeliveryUnit", "BEAST:ReferenceToWeb", "BEAST:EndCustomersOrderLineNumber", "BEAST:OfferLineNumber", any other type of document or item).

Element.Name: Attachment.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Group to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.

Element.Name: Embedded Binary object.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The referenced document can here be inserted as a binary object (T6475). filename refers to T6476.

Element.Name: External Reference.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.

Element.Name: Address to internet resource.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource (T6187).
BEAst: Article Description (T6226) Peppol:
BEAst: Buyer's Part Article Number (T6022)/Article Number (T0172) when T6317="BP"/Littera (T6417). Peppol:
BEAst: Supplier's Article Number (T0172) Peppol:
BEAst: Only one Standard Item Number can be used per line. Peppol:

BEAst: Global Trade Item Number (T0154) or RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023). All other item number standards used within BEAst can not be used here until the organisation behind the standard decides to be a part of the codelist "ISO 6523 ICD". These are: NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo/Vilma Article Number (T6029), Norwegian RSK Article Number (T6024), Norwegian E-number (T6026), E-number (T0260) and SGTIN (T6461). Peppol:

Element.Name: Commodity Classification.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. To classify when an item number is not sufficient.

Element.Name: Item Classification code.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to classify the material when the item number is not sufficient (T6466), to inform about the source of classification standard (T6467) and to provide standard branch codes for the items. The Reference to Article Class (T6466) is the ItemClassificationCode, listID = "ZZZ", listVersionID = BEAST:4.0" and name is Source to Classification (T6467).

Attribute.Description: BEAst: For Item Classification Codes that are found in UNCL7143, select the correct code and leave listVersionID and name empty. For construction specific list that are not a part of UNCL7143 yet ListID must always be "ZZZ" and listVersionID "BEAST:4.0", i.e. mutually agreed.

BEAst: If construction specific lists are used, name specifies which of them is used. Possible names are: "SBMI", "SA", "AI", “ME” and "CoClass”. "SBMI" = Sveriges Bergmaterialindustrier, "SA" = Sveriges Åkeriföretag, "AI" = Återvinningsindustrierna, “ME” = Maskinentreprenörerna.

Element.Description: BEAst: Dangerous Goods Code (T0169) Peppol:
BEAst: Dangerous Goods, Hazard Code (T0263) Peppol:

BEAst: This group is also in BEAst used for ConfigurationValue (T6369), GUID Identifier (T6408), Treatment code (T6468), Alternative Vehicle Type (T6339), EPD data, NeC additional information about Asphalt and Concrete, Price information and Rental additional information. Peppol:
BEAst: Product Group Code (T0011), Property Name (T6446), Product Type Description (T6442). When the NameCode is used, the name can be set to "NA" since it is mandatory to have. Peppol:

BEAst: "ConfigurationValue", "GUIDIdentifier", "TreatmentCode", "AlternativeVehicleType", "EPDDataSetID", "EPDDataSetURL", "EPDPDFURL", "ResourceID", "Price" or "Rental". Property ID NeC (T6469), Property ID Type (T6443), Identity Type Code (T6440). listID refers to Property ID (T6444) but is always "BEAST:4.0" when NameCode is any of the fix values defined here. Peppol:

BEAst: Price Amount (T6235), Alternative Vehicle Type (T6339), Configuration Value (T6369), GUID Identifier (T6408), Property Class ID (T6441), Property Value (T6452), Treatment Code (T6468), EPD data, Resource ID, Rental Indicator (T6477) or Article Property (T6470). The Rental Indicator (T6477) is changed from "True"/"False" to "Rental"/"Purchase". Peppol:
BEAst: Property Compare Code (T6457), Price Unit Basis Quantity (T6722). unitCode refers to Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706). Peppol:
BEAst: Property Value ID (T6450), Price Specification Code (T6721). Peppol:
BEAst: Production or Manufacture Date (T0262) Peppol:
BEAst: Best Before Date (T3276) Peppol:
BEAst: Serial Number (T3236) or SGTIN (T6461) Peppol:
BEAst: Batch Number (T0132). Peppol:

Element.Name: Certificate.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used for referring to the Certificate for Wooden products.

Element.Name: Identity of the Certificate .
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Certificate Number (T6413).

Element.Name: Certificate Type Code .
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA.

Element.Name: Certificate Type .
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Identifies the type of Certificate (T6412).

Element.Name: Remarks.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. Used to inform about how much is certified, in percent (T6414).

Element.Name: Issuer Party
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The authorized organization that issued this certificate, the provider of the certificate.

Element.Name: Party Name
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The name of the party issuing the certificate.

Element.Name: Party Name.
Element.Description: BEAst: Added by BEAst. The UBL structure used requires this element. Use the value NA.

BEAst: This group is used when it is possible to describe the content of the Transport Handilng Units. If that is not the case, the Transport Handling Units should instead be listed at header level, under Shipment. Peppol:
BEAst: The SSCC identification code of this Transport Handling Unit (T0138). Peppol:
BEAst: Type of Transport Handling Unit (T6119). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21 with addition of the codes used by "Retursystem Byggpall". Peppol:
BEAst: To describe the type of measurement (T6714). Use UNCL 6313 subset. Peppol:
BEAst: For the measure (T6122) and Measure of Unit Code (T6706). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 20 and 21. subset. Peppol:
BEAst: Unique identity of the package (T0138). Peppol:
BEAst: Type of Package (T6119). Use UN/ECE Recommendation 21 with addition of the codes used by "Retursystem Byggpall". Peppol:
